column1: Patients who reported that staff definitely gave care in a professional way and the facility was clean
column2: Patients who reported that staff somewhat gave care in a professional way or the facility was somewhat clean
column3: Patients who reported that staff did not give care in a professional way or the facility was not clean
column4: Facilities and staff linear mean score
column5: Patients who reported that staff definitely communicated about what to expect during and after the procedure
column6: Patients who reported that staff somewhat communicated about what to expect during and after the procedure
column7: Patients who reported that staff did not communicate about what to expect during and after the procedure
column8: Communication about your procedure linear mean score
column9: Patients who gave the facility a rating of 9 or 10 on a scale from 0 (lowest) to 10 (highest)
column10: Patients who gave the facility a rating of 7 or 8 on a scale from 0 (lowest) to 10 (highest)
column11: Patients who gave the facility a rating of 0 to 6 on a scale from 0 (lowest) to 10 (highest)
column12: Patients’ rating of the facility linear mean score
column13: Patients who reported YES they would DEFINITELY recommend the facility to family or friends
column14: Patients who reported PROBABLY YES they would recommend the facility to family or friends
column15: Patients who reported NO, they would not recommend the facility to family or friends
column16: Patients recommending the facility linear mean score
